EmailTemplate.name: Distributor PRM rejects the deal to Partner
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Deal Reg: “{!Lead.Deal_Name__c}” has been rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.OwnerFullName},
Your Deal Reg: “{!Lead.Deal_Name__c}” has been rejected. Please Click on the link below to access the Deal Reg details. You can re-submit the deal reg after modifications {!$Label.Partner_email_community_URL}/{!Lead.Id}
Please contact your PSM for more details.
Best Regards, Nokia PRM Sales Team
